name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!
Adds 146 cards, 7 relics, 3 potions and new buff/debuff powers exclusively to the Duelist character.

REQUIREMENTS
Basemod, StSLib, Replay the Spire, Conspire, The Servant, Slimebound

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.146.1
- Fixed Gravity Axe crash
- Tokens now re-summon properly when triggered via a Tribute effect
- Fissure should work better? Probably not
- Blast Juggler got nerfed
- Parasite Paracide power text is clearer, modifier is more indicative of actual effect chance

v1.146.0
- Added 4 new cards: Blast Juggler, Legendary Exodia Incarnate, Thunder Dragon, Superancient Dinobeast
- Increased damage on Cannon Solider to 10 (from 5)
- Card Destruction text is now correct on upgraded copy
- Removed Big Castle Walls
- Cards in starting deck are now all basic rarity
- Dark Factory now gives 3 mana, or 4 when upgraded
- Gate Guardian now evokes only 2 orbs when upgraded, plus card text now reflects extra tribute logic surrounding Sanga Thunder/Kazejin/Suijin
- Kuriboh now applies Intangible correctly
- Mirror Force now applies damage correctly
- Ookazi now deals (5-9) damage, or (7-12) when upgraded
- Pot of Avarice+ can now be played with 0 summons
- Pot of Dichotomy now gives 2 extra summons, or 4 on upgrade
- Scapegoat now applies Intangible correctly
- Scrap Factory now gives 2 mana, or 3 mana when upgraded
- Summoned Skull now deals 11 damage
- Superheavy Magnet now Tributes 2, and has an effect for tributing magnet warriors. Increased block gain
- Superheavy Ogre now gives Dexterity when tributed by Superheavy monsters
- Swords of Concealing Light is now Rare
- Toon Kingdom and Toon World now start with fewer damage stacks
- Millennium Eye now gives a Toon World power that starts with fewer damage stacks
- Unlocked all cards in the compendium for now (even random only cards)
- Harpie's Feather Duster now gives 2x block for stacks removed
- Spirit of the Harp now damages you if you tribute it for a dragon
- Fixed some card text strings
- Shard of Greed is now Uncommon and costs 1
- Every instance of the word (on cards at least) is now capitalized!



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
